name: qasm-language-support
description: QASM language support for Visual Studio Code
author: Isma Development Team

scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.compile: npm run compile:parser && tsc -p client/tsconfig.json && cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:parser: cd server && npm run antlr4ts && cd ..
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run compile && cd client && node ./node_modules/vscode/bin/test
